column1: Baby Barnaby's////I second Liz S's motion for the breakfast plate
column3: grits or potatoes (go with the potatoes!)
column5: and choice of bread; it's what I always end up ordering when I come to Baby Barnaby's. The pancakes are also good - large and fluffy
column6: and perfect with a seasonal fruit. I can't remember when they took Migas off the menu
column7: but it's a shame because the Huevos Rancheros aren't as good.
